altername_name: First Kiss Story II: Anata ga Irukara Limited Edition
First Kiss Story II: Anata ga Iru kara
name: First Kiss Monogatari II: Anata ga Irukara Limited Edition
overview: First Kiss Monogatari II: Anata ga Irukara (ファーストKISS☆物語II 〜あなたがいるから〜) is a 2002 adventure game by Broccoli for the Sega Dreamcast. A limited edition was also released that included a port of the game's prequel.
